org.smartfrog.services.xunit.listeners.xml
Interface XmlListener

All Superinterfaces:
LogListener, java.rmi.Remote, TestListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
OneHostHtmlListener, OneHostXMLListener
public interface XmlListener
extends TestListener

An XML listener also lets you get the name of the file, as an operation on the interface, and as an attribute that is added to a test suite when run. That is, every test knows the name of the test. created Nov 23, 2004 3:47:29 PM

          the name of the file that is used to store the XML output of the test
